analysis.key_quote: I oppose these changes. I believe these changes will have a bad effect on the quality of the federal workforce and, by extension, on the quality of services provided to the American people.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule changes, citing concerns about the negative impact on the quality of the federal workforce and the potential for politicization. It emphasizes the importance of merit-based systems and due process protections for employees.
